scripts.acceptance-tests-prod: cp ./individual-configuration-files/.env.template-prod-mode.json ./.env.json && cp individual-configuration-files/codecept.conf-production.js codecept.conf.js && ./setup.sh demo && npx codeceptjs run --steps
scripts.acceptance-tests-demo: cp ./individual-configuration-files/.env.template-demo-mode.json ./.env.json && cp individual-configuration-files/codecept.conf-demo.js codecept.conf.js && ./setup.sh demo && npx codeceptjs run --steps
scripts.acceptance-tests: cp ./.env.template.json ./.env.json && cp individual-configuration-files/codecept.conf-regular.js codecept.conf.js && ./setup.sh && npx codeceptjs run --steps
